Meeting Information.content_preview:
- **Date**: YYYY-MM-DD
- **Time**: HH:MM - HH:MM TZ
- **Participants**: All assigned agents

Review Product Backlog (15 min).content_preview:
- Review prioritized backlog items
- Clarify any questions about requirements

Sprint Goal Definition (10 min).content_preview:
- Define clear sprint goal
- Ensure alignment with project objectives

Story Estimation (30 min).content_preview:
- Planning poker for story points
- Discuss complexity and risks

Capacity Planning (15 min).content_preview:
- Review team capacity
- Account for holidays/time off
- Calculate velocity buffer

Sprint Commitment (20 min).content_preview:
- Select stories for sprint
- Ensure realistic commitment
- Identify dependencies

Task Breakdown (30 min).content_preview:
- Break stories into tasks
- Assign tasks to agents
- Identify blockers

Definition of Done Review (10 min).content_preview:
- Review and update DoD
- Ensure all agents understand criteria

Risk Assessment (10 min).content_preview:
- Identify sprint risks
- Plan mitigation strategies

Output Documents.content_preview:
- backlog-items.md
- sprint-goal.md
- agent-assignments.md
- capacity-plan.md
- risk-assessment.md
- dependencies.md
- definition-of-done.md
- histori...
